Copy Description: 7.44 from Nature 2012 supplement.

Some more potential information from S1_PLoS_OHI2015:
These data are used in the economies sub-goal of the coastal livelihoods and economies goal to adjust revenue data. Updated GDP data through 2012 (reported in 2012 US dollars) were accessed from the World Bank (data.worldbank.org/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD). For the three EEZs that fall within the China region (China, Macau, and Hong Kong), we combined the values using a population-weighted average.
